text: Saim Bülend Ulusu (24 April 1923 – 23 December 2015) was a Turkish admiral. He was Prime Minister of Turkey serving from September 21, 1980 through December 13, 1983. He was succeeded by future Turkish president Turgut Özal. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Admirals Category:Politicians from Istanbul Category:Prime ministers of Turkey Category:Turkish military people
title: Bülend Ulusu
